dataset_info.description: Multi-ECU Functional Safety Requirements with Mixed Granularity (enriched: ecu/vehicle/asil/sg/safestate/ftti + IR slots) + augmented with normal/abnormal cases for IR-slot + anchor-based granularity experiments
dataset_info.note: raw_text preserved; missing fields filled with TBD; IR slots tagged from raw_text + existing ir_record when available. | augmented: added normal (well-specified) and abnormal (underspecified/conflicting/inconsistent/duplicate-like) requirements.
